scripts.lint: eslint_d FlowPluginsTs Community methods examples tests Local/ClassicPlugins Local/FlowTemplatesTs --ext js,ts
scripts.lint:fix: eslint_d FlowPluginsTs Community methods examples tests Local/ClassicPlugins Local/FlowTemplatesTs --ext js,ts --fix
scripts.build: npm run build:plugins && npm run build:templates
scripts.build:templates: cd Local && tsc FlowTemplatesTs/video/*.ts --outDir FlowTemplates/video --target es2018 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && find FlowTemplates/video -type d -name 'FlowPluginsTs' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find FlowTemplates/video -type d -name 'Local' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
